CustomObject.description:
The Process Switch is a custom Metadata Type used as a check control whether Apex Triggers, Validation Rules, or Flows are allowed to Run.
Extend as needed for other types of Processes / Automations
When building, always include the master {"All" Switch } and the Switch for the specific Hierarchy. EX: When building the Account Trigger, include {"All Apex Trigger Switches"} && {"Trigger Switch: Account"}, check that the related Process Switch is either: {Enabled} or {not Disabled}.
Change Process Switches to {"Disabled"} when performing Data Loads to increse performance
CustomObject.label: Process Switch
